item.title: Intro to Load Balancing
item.description: Load balancing at its simplest is defined as distributing load across a group of servers, so they appear to the clients/users as one big server. Load balancing does more than simply distribute load. It helps with redundancy. It helps with scaling the service provided, without the users having to know about it. And more. Iâ€™ll attempt to capture some of it here. This can serve as an overview to load balancing.

item.title: About me
item.description: I’m a software engineer by profession. My hobbies are movies and books. I write mostly about books I’m reading or something I’m learning about at the moment. Thanks for reading!
